title: Literature: Unsuccessfully Competing Against TV Since 1953
description: Friends, it's time to get Literatured Up! Time to take on the classics with the special Sheldon collection Litature: Unsuccessfully Competing Against TV Since 1953. From Seuss to Shakespeare, Twain to Tolkien...all your favorite literary subjects are skewered: It's the perfect book for book-lovers."I can not LIVE without books."- Thomas Jefferson(...a man who later died)
author: Dave Kellett
